annotationId.description: A unique identifier for a command annotation.

annotationType.description: The type of annotation (for machine parsing)

parentAnnotation.description: The parent annotation of this annotation, if any.

secondOrderCommand.description: Annotates a group of atomic commands which were the direct result of a second order command (e.g. transfer, consolidate, mix)

params.description: key value pairs of the parameters that were passed to the second order command that this annotates

machineReadableName.description: The name of the second order command in the form that the generating software refers to it. (e.g. 'transfer', 'thermocyclerStep')

userSpecifiedName.description: The optional user-specified name of the second order command

userSpecifiedDescription.description: The optional user-specified description of the second order command

userCommand.description: A user generated command annotation as opposed to one generated automatically.

params.description: key value pairs of the parameters that were passed to the second order command that this annotates

userSpecifiedName.description: The optional user-specified name of the second order command

userSpecifiedDescription.description: The optional user-specified description of the second order command

custom.description: Annotates a group of atomic commands in some manner that Opentrons software does not anticipate or originate
